topic.title: Changes in the Fuzzy Segment Search function

body.p: Translators can not only select a Class (e.g. Class-0 (0 words difference)), but can also define ranges of classes like Up to and including the selected class. Found results can be displayed to show (or hide) the differences between the segments by selecting the option Show and export differences in search results. Found results can be exported into an XML-file for further processing.
